sections.tcp_socket_unavailable: There is no access to the TCP media socket of the server:

sections.checking_connectivity: Checking the availability UDP AV ports
sections.connectivity_ok:
Access to all AV ports has been verified,
everything is working properly
sections.connectivity_tcp_only:
No access to UDP ports,
the AV traffic will be transmitted via TCP

sections.name: Title
sections.deny_turn_speak: Prohibit participants from taking the floor on their own
sections.disable_microphone_if_no_speak: Turn off participants' microphones when they don't take the floor
sections.disable_camera_if_no_speak: Turn off participants' cameras when they don't take the floor
sections.disable_speaker_change: Turn off the output of the speaking participant in the main window
sections.deny_turn_microphone: Prohibit participants from turning on the microphone themselves
sections.deny_turn_camera: Prohibit participants from turning on the camera themselves
sections.dont_ask_turn_devices: Turn on a participant's camera/microphone without asking
sections.deny_self_connect: Prohibit participants from connecting to this conference on their own
sections.auto_connect_on_start: Automatically connect participants when the presenter is connected

sections.forward_message: Select the recipients of the message
sections.name: Username

sections.asymmetric: Asymmetric (everyone sees the presenter and speakers)

sections.remove_user: Remove a user from the list

sections.kick: Remove a participant from the conference
sections.to_top: Raise the participant to the first window

sections.added_to_conference: You have been added to the conference
sections.subscriber_answer_timeout: The subscriber has not answered for a long time, perhaps he is not there (or he does not want to answer)

Let's create your first conference!

Just send the link to your friends,
they'll join and you'll have a reliable communication channel.

Create a conference?

sections.title: Settings
sections.connection_remember: Do not ask for a password when logging in
sections.auto_answer: Automatically pick up the phone on an incoming call
sections.auto_connect_to_conference: Automatically connect to the conference when it starts
sections.show_avatars: Show the avatar when the participant's camera is disabled
sections.request_turn_cam_mic: Request the inclusion of the camera/microphone by the moderator
sections.auto_start_app: Automatically launch the application when the computer is turned on
sections.hide_to_tray: Collapse to tray instead of closing
sections.accentuate_speaker: Display the speaking participant in the main window
sections.use_demonstration_window: Display the screen display in a special window
sections.only_mp3_sound: Record only audio in MP3 format
